questions.question: How to add a game
questions.answer: Navigate to the Library section and click on 'Add Game'. Fill in the details and submit.

questions.question: How to download code
questions.answer: Go to the Code Library, select the code snippet you need, and click on the 'Download' button.

questions.question: What games are featured
questions.answer: We have games like Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria, Ready or Not, Dead by Daylight, and more in our featured section.
